author: Dov Lieber
title: Benjamin Netanyahu Cancels Agreement to Resettle African Migrants
text:
TEL AVIVâ€”Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Tuesday ditched a deal with the United Nations to resettle thousands of African asylum seekers, in a swift about-face that shows the pressure he faces from his right-wing coalition partners.
Some 35,000 African migrants in Israel now face uncertainty over their fate after years of battling a plan to stend them back to Africa. The deal with the U.N. would have relocated thousands to Western countries, while allowing about half to stay in Israel.
...
